channel.title: Bug on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Bug on Noetic Nought

item.title: cStringIO and unicode
item.description: StringIO in the cStringIO module in Python 2.7.2 doesn’t handle unicode strings properly. This bug has bitten me on a couple of occasions, in the recent past. Just making a note for myself: Use StringIO if speed doesn’t matter so much. Whenever possible, just convert the input to StringIO to a string, if what you are doing doesn’t really require unicode strings. Or may be it’s just time to move up to Python 2.7.3
